title: 12 Monkeys
review: I like this a lot. Gilliam movies are hit-and-miss, but this one is my favourite of his and I think it's aged very well. It's edgy and unpredictable. The time travel is complex and interesting enough for the plot to revolve around it well. Bruce Willis spends most of the movie being confused and meek, and Brad Pitt injects a lot of energy to counter this. It's full of little foreshadowing and worldbuilding details, in the script and sets. I haven't seen the TV show but I want to.
